other_tests.findings: Loss-of-function variants of the X-chromosomal TLR7 were identified, associated with impaired type I and III interferon responses.
All identified TLR7 variants were confirmed by standard Sanger sequencing and co-segregation analysis.
Defective upregulation of type I interferon-related genes in response to TLR7 agonist imiquimod was observed in patients compared to controls.
Patients were completely deficient for IFN-γ production in response to TLR7 stimulation.
Cytokines' production was measured, with patients displaying low IFN-γ response to TLR7 stimulation.
